attributes.action: Deal with the awful driving standards of food delivery drivers both mopeds/bikes
attributes.additional_details: This is going to result in a lot of road rage incidents and most importantly accidents and deaths. I feel that these drivers should be policed and targeted for the legal driving status, a check in their driving licences and increased training and regulation to make sure they reach a satisfactory standard of driving.
attributes.background: The driving standards are appalling for these class of drivers.  I often drive a bus for 8 plus hours a day and I witness numerous rules being breached, jumping red lights, playing with their phones whilst driving, undertaking, exceeding speed limits and driving on the pavement.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701034
